definition: to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-

to go/to go to (a place)/(of a time etc) last/just passed/to send/to remove/to get rid of/to reduce/to be apart from in space or time/to die (euphemism)/to play (a part)/(when used either before or after a verb) to go in order to do sth/(after a verb of motion indicates movement away from the speaker)/(used after certain verbs to indicate detachment or separation)

sentences.english: Whether justified, the management but also health troubles.
sentences.chinese: 不管说不过去，管又要生烦恼。

definition: acceptable/passable/justifiable/(of a course of action) to make sense
to force someone to do something
not presentable/shoddy and too embarrassing to show
see 未可厚非[wei4 ke3 hou4 fei1]
returning to our main topic,.../that said,.../again,.../in this connection/in passing/nevertheless,.../anyhow
good and bad/most unfortunate occurrence/in any case/whatever
firmly set on doing sth/to insist on doing/determined in one's course of action
to feel embarrassed or awkward/to make things difficult (for someone)/to find things difficult (to do or manage)
